cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccine Program UConn Health offers COVID-19 vaccines for ages 5 and up. If you or a family member have not yet received the COVID-19 vaccine and are 5 years of age or older, we encourage you to schedule an appointment with your UConn Health primary care physician. Important note: Only the Pfizer vaccine is currently approved for those under 18 years old. The Moderna vaccine is only authorized for use by those aged 18+. UConn Health is administering 3 different types of COVID-19 vaccines: - Pfizer mRNA vaccine - Moderna mRNA vaccine - Novavax (available on a case-by-case basis) Looking for a Vaccination Clinic for Ages 6 Months to 5 Years Old? Visit [Vaccines.gov](https://www.vaccines.gov/search/) to find a location. For the latest information regarding the COVID-19 vaccine, please refer to the [CDC Website](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/index.html). COVID Vaccine Scheduling We now offer COVID-19 vaccinations to patients exclusively through their primary care office. Please contact your primary care provider (PCP) for these services. If you do not have a UConn Health PCP and would like to establish care, please call [1-84-GET-UCONN](tel:1-844-388-2666). Patients are no longer able to self-schedule COVID-19 vaccines through MyChart. Contact COVID Vaccine Call Center Phone: [860-679-8888](tel:860-679-8888) (for questions or vaccine issues)
